verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> shall the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> be likened <S%G3666><s%> unto <S%G3933><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> virgins <S%G3933><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lamps <S%G2985><s%>, and went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1519><s%> to meet <S%G529><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> foolish <S%G3474><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> were wise <S%G5429><s%>.

For <S%G3748><s%> the foolish <S%G3474><s%>, when they took <S%G2983><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> lamps <S%G2985><s%>, took <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G1438><s%>:
but <S%G1161><s%> the wise <S%G5429><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> vessels <S%G30><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lamps <S%G2985><s%>.
Now while <S%G1161><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> tarried <S%G5549><s%>, they <S%G3573><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> slumbered <S%G3573><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> slept <S%G2518><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> at <S%G3319><s%> midnight <S%G3571><s%> there is a <S%G1096><s%> cry <S%G2906><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%>! Come <S%G2064><s%> ye <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1519><s%> to meet <S%G529><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
Then <S%G5119><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> virgins <S%G3933><s%> arose <S%G1453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> trimmed <S%G2885><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lamps <S%G2985><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the foolish <S%G3474><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto the wise <S%G5429><s%>, Give <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> lamps <S%G2985><s%> are going out <S%G4570><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the wise <S%G5429><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Peradventure <S%G3379><s%> there will not <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G714><s%> enough <S%G714><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>: go ye <S%G4198><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them that sell <S%G4453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> buy <S%G59><s%> for yourselves <S%G1438><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> while <S%G565><s%> they <S%G846><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away to buy <S%G59><s%>, the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they that were ready <S%G2092><s%> went in <S%G1525><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the marriage <S%G1062><s%> feast <S%G2532><s%>: and the door <S%G2374><s%> was shut <S%G2808><s%>.

Afterward <S%G5305><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3933><s%> other <S%G3062><s%> virgins <S%G3933><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, open <S%G455><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, I know <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is as <S%G5618><s%> when a man <S%G444><s%>, going into another country <S%G589><s%>, called <S%G2564><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> his <S%G846><s%> goods <S%G5224><s%>.

Straightway <S%G1161><s%> he that received <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> traded <S%G2038><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G2532><s%>, and made <S%G4160><s%> other <S%G243><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%>.
In <S%G2532><s%> like <S%G5615><s%> manner he <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> received the two <S%G1417><s%> gained <S%G2770><s%> other <S%G243><s%> two <S%G1417><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he that received <S%G2983><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away and <S%G2532><s%> digged <S%G3736><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hid <S%G613><s%> his <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%>'s money <S%G694><s%>.

Now after <S%G3326><s%> a <S%G5550><s%> long <S%G4183><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> of <S%G1401><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> maketh a <S%G3056><s%> reckoning <S%G4868><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And he that received <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and brought <S%G4374><s%> other <S%G243><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, thou deliveredst <S%G3860><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%>: lo <S%G1492><s%>, I have gained <S%G2770><s%> other <S%G243><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%>.

His <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Well done <S%G2095><s%>, good <S%G18><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%>: thou hast been <S%G2258><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> a few things <S%G3641><s%>, I will set <S%G2525><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> many things <S%G3641><s%>; enter thou <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the joy <S%G5479><s%> of <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%>.

His <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Well done <S%G2095><s%>, good <S%G18><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%>: thou hast been <S%G2258><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> a few things <S%G3641><s%>, I will set <S%G2525><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%>; enter thou <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the joy <S%G5479><s%> of <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%>.

thou <S%G4571><s%> oughtest <S%G1163><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to have put <S%G906><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> money <S%G694><s%> to the bankers <S%G5133><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> at my coming <S%G2064><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> should have received <S%G2865><s%> back <S%G302><s%> mine own <S%G1699><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> interest <S%G5110><s%>.

for <S%G1063><s%> I was hungry <S%G3983><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye gave <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%>; I was thirsty <S%G1372><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye gave <S%G4222><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> drink <S%G4222><s%>; I was <S%G2252><s%> a stranger <S%G3581><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye took <S%G4863><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> in <S%G4863><s%>;

naked <S%G1131><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye clothed <S%G4016><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>; I was sick <S%G770><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye visited <S%G1980><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>; I was <S%G2252><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

And when <S%G4219><s%> saw we <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> a stranger <S%G3581><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> took thee in <S%G4863><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> clothed thee <S%G4016><s%>?
